msbt.message: It's New Year's Eve at long last, !Let's give a proper send-off, .
Oh my! Before you know it, there's less than an hour until the new year beginsand the old one fades away. I'm not sure I'm ready to say goodbye. Perhaps I'll enjoy just a wee bit longer, .

This year flew by in the blink of an eye. Perhaps it's because life on this island is so exhilarating.Still, if time keeps passing like this, I'll be a little old lady before I know it. A little old lady with a lot of style, of course!

Before everyone gathered in the plaza, I was thinking back on this past year Goodness, I got rather emotional about it! It was quite a year, after all.But never mind that. Tonight is a night to celebrate. And next year will be even more fabulous than last!
Well, aren't we perfectly prepared for the Countdown with our celebratory hats! Let's show the new year that we're ready for whatever it plans to throw our way, !
Oh, , that New Year's hat looks fabulous on you!How does mine look on me? Silly? Stylish? A bit of both, I hope!
Now, now, ! You're not wearing a New Year's hat!I'm wearing mine, and yet there you arehatless! Tsk, tsk! Your poor head must feel so left out!
Well, what do you think? Doesn't this New Year's hat suit me PERFECTLY? Remember, my dear, the celebratory look is always in fashion.
Oh, I see you're wearing a New Year's hat! Goodness, you beat me to it
Well, isn't your New Year's hat lovely, ! I mustn't let you outshine me, darling
So, what do you think? Be honest!<10_4 /> I couldn't just stand by and let you wear yours all alone, .
Oh my, it's past 11:00 already! If you'll excuse me for a moment
Well, I suppose it's the perfect time to put this on
So, how do I look in my New Year's hat?<10_4 /> My Countdown party attire just wasn't complete without it.
It won't be long now before the new year is upon us and the celebration is all around us. Let's quietly savor the last moments of while we can. We'll never have this chance again.
I tell you, my dear, I'm prepared to welcome this new year with open arms! Let's get into the celebratory spirit and get ready to take on whatever comes our way!

What a magical moment midnight is. When the clock strikes twelve, an entire year slips away forever In that moment, you can't help but see how precious and fleeting time truly is. Fortunately, there's a brand-new year right there, just waiting for you to make the most of it.
There's nothing like a party hat to get one in the mood to celebrate! Hence my New Year's finery. I see you, too, appreciate a festive headpiece. It's as if you were born to wear that hat, darling!
Why, , that New Year's hat suits you perfectly!With that hat on your head and that smile on your face, the new year is going to be so pleased to meet you!
My goodness, you're not wearing a New Year's hat!A bit of friendly advice, my dear There will never be a better time to put it on than now!
Why, isn't it time for you to show me what you look like in your New Year's hat? Go on, let me take a look. No need to be shy around me, !
Just look at that hat of yours! Well, you know me, I'm not one to miss a fashion trend
Oh, that's right! Seeing you just reminded me
I simply HAD to put my New Year's hat on! You made it look so good, ! Now we can be matchy-matchy as we ring in the new year, !
There's no time like the present for festive hats! Here we go
Oh dear! I nearly forgot! Pardon me a moment
Fabulous, isn't it? <10_4 />Well, do try not to stare, darling.And consider putting on a New Year's hat of your own, why don't you? It'll look fab on you too!
Mother of pearl! Things are starting to happen!
Less than five minutes to go! Oh, , let's usher in the big moment together!
My stars, but my heart is all aflutter! The moments right before the clock strikes midnight are terribly exciting!
Oh, ! I hope you're ready to ring in the new year!<10_7 arg="120" />
Brace yourself, my dear The new year is here!<10_7 arg="120" />
The party outside must have started by now, I suppose.Not to worry—there's still plenty of time until the big moment. No need to rush, .

Well, I finished everything I needed to do.Now all I have to do is relax and wait for the evening's main event.What time does it happen? Oh dear, what other time would it be? Twelve o'clock sharp, of course.
It's less than an hour until the new year arrivesand you know, I'm so glad you stopped by. It's a pleasure to say goodbye to the old year and hello to the new one with good company by my side.
Isn't it about time for everyone to gather at the event plaza?As for little ol' meI'm done for the day. I'll be enjoying the Countdown from the comforts of my home.

This year was a good one, indeed. After all, I got to know you,
But, I am rather greedy. I do hope to get to know you even better next year, .
Midnight simply can't come soon enough. I am SO ready for the new year to arrive! My goodness, this waiting game is such a tease!
Less than five minutes left until is gone for good I can't help but find that a teensy bit sad.

Are you going to ring in the new year here, my dear? If not, you should hurry over to the event plaza. I think I'll just relax at home this year. Of course, you're more than welcome to join me if you like.

The event plaza must be abuzz with excitement. Alas, I don't have time to get done up for the festivities. I knowI'll simply pamper myself here at home instead! It'll be nice to start the new year feeling refreshed.
Ohit's nearly midnight<10_7 arg="120" />
Fare thee well, my dear <10_7 arg="120" />
Hahaha! Time to cut loose and make a ruckus, darling! Not to worry, we won't be bothering anyone!
I feel as though I could burstjust like those fireworks. What a thrilling night this has been, !
There's something I want to tell you now that the new year has begun, I know I'm not perfect, but I do hope to be a better friend in , .
A roaring Countdown party on It's everything I hoped it would be and much more! Haha! Don't mind me, I'm just swept up in the moment!
It gets so quiet when the fireworks end. Well, it's high time I say my "Happy New Years" to everyone. I, for one, will be celebrating the dawning of until morning, !
I'm staying up all night tonight! I refuse to miss a single moment!I tell you, I can keep this upfor hoursyaaaaaawwwnWait! Th—That wasjust some facial exercises I like to do! I'm not sleepy at all.
The Countdown and the fireworks may be over, but I plan to celebrate until the sun comes up!I think I can afford to miss ONE night of beauty rest, don't you?
My New Year's resolution is to make even more fabulous than last year.I realize that's a tall order, but if anyone can do it I can, !
It's sounds so boisterous out there! Everyone must be having a fabulous time. I rather enjoy celebrating quietly here at home, but perhaps next year I'll make a big splash at the party.
I'm so pleased you came to visit me! I couldn't ask to start the new year with better company, ,
Aren't you worried about missing the fireworks? Don't worry about me. Go watch them, . You're more than welcome to come back here after you've had your fill of colorful lights and explosions.
Thank you for everything you did for me this last year, .Of course, I won't argue with you if you'd like to continue doing things for me in as well.
Are the fireworks already over, then? They made quite a racket for a while there. Fireworks or not, I bet everyone is still out celebrating. I do hope I'm not missing out on TOO much fun!
Did you get a chance to wish a "Happy New Year" to everyone, ? I bet everyone is still awake if you haven't. I won't mind if you want to go wish them well.
Oh, , has begun! I want to stay up all night and savor this new beginning YawwwwwnYes, well, clearly that's going to be much more difficult than I thought.
So, , did you make any New Year's resolutions for ? Well, you'll never believe it, but I decided toum, to give up ZzzzzzzzzzzzzzzOh! I'm so sorry! What were we talking about, again?
